name: Macalino Marketing
description:
Macalino Marketing, Inc. is a 22 year old Philadelphia based, woman owned and operated, full service advertising agency. We have extensive experience with diverse corporate accounts including non-profit, retail, medical, educational, and community based initiatives.
Fran Macalino, the founder of Macalino Marketing, has extensive project management experience in addition to creative, analytical and strategic marketing expertise, and a thorough knowledge of all aspects of the print industry from layout through prepress and printing. Our staff separates each project into phases. We become a partner with the client to fully understand their history, point of view, goals and market. We ask a lot of questions but then we listen, achieving desired results, impeccably executing clear communication into a targeted message building solid branding systems and effective marketing strategies, always staying within budget and meeting the targeted deadline.
